Ann Sayre Wiseman
July 1987

Flying Dreams

The phenomenon of flying in one's sleep is truly a miracle. If, as they say, ontogeny recapitulates philogeny, then consider the premise that we are all, at some time in our primal development. equipped with tail, gills and wings and all other ...

Ann Sayre Wiseman
Volume 6, issue 2
